Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Specimen Container(s): Xpert® Nasopharyngeal Sample Collection Kit (plastic medical-grade polypropylene tube with viral transport medium)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert® Flu+RSV Xpress multiplex RT-PCR assay and sample collection kit for qualitative detection of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV viral RNA in nasopharyngeal swabs on GeneXpert Xpress System
Indications for Use Summary: Automated multiplex RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A, influenza B, and respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) RNA from nasopharyngeal swab specimens in patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection; intended as an aid in diagnosis alongside clinical and epidemiological risk factors.
